Text.val: 19.11.2014 SH SCR19323 Added calc v.NOTTRADED, used to perform BPH113 to book differences
07.11.2014 GB SCR19307 Book difference: Removed test that ... and V.DIFFERENCE <= CLNT313_MAXAMOUNT
24.10.2014 SH SCR19259 Added test SFIN_ERRORCODE <> 41 to SFIN selection and added test V.DIFFERENCE <= CLNT313_MAXAMOUNT
-- Tables BTCH, BTCP and SFIP are opened for write mode; tables BTCH, BTCP are
-- Final bookings if BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT / INVOICE are handled

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVA where INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' and INVA_NO in (select BPIV_INVO_NO from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :3 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :4 and BPIV_INVO_NO > 0) for fetch only
